title: Textile, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: damask weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft (weft runs from top to bottom of pattern): 87.9 x 74.9 cm (34 5/8 x 29 1/2 in.)
description: Green satin with design in white. In the central scene, a stag is pursued by hounds amid foliage; in the corners, mounted riders with hounds; foliage borders. Edged with narrow silver galloons.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: damask weave. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1967-53-4.
